page.title: 06FARMING DANGER
page.content: {TRACTORS There is hard work on farms, but there is also danger, especially to young people. Just a few days ago a boy aged ten was driving a Ford 3910 in his daddy's orchard and drove over his older sister killing her. This scene took place in April 1985.} {SLURRY PITS }These can be very dangerous. An example of this is when I was helping a man called Billy Craney to put slurry out, when he turned on the drive-shaft to stir the slurry until it was ready to be spread in the field. Then suddenly out of nowhere gas began to suck me into the pit. I was slowly being dragged to the pit. Luckily Billy saw me and without thinking he ran over to me and tried holding me back, but he couldn't. So running over, he turned it off. This scene took place in 1983.
